pr_title: [MINOR] Metrics: reinstated get/setWhitelist with Deprecated warning

timeline.message:
reinstated get/setWhitelist with Deprecated warning

Signed-off-by: Sally MacFarlane <sally.macfarlane@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText:
Make it a non-javadoc comment, otherwise there is a chance that some check will fail in the build.
i.e. // use getHostsAllowList instead
timeline.author: usmansaleem

timeline.message:
removed javadoc comments

Signed-off-by: Sally MacFarlane <sally.macfarlane@consensys.net>
